title: Rammus Jeggings Pull on Stretchy Jeans for Women High Waisted Skinny Jean Leggings Tummy Control Denim Pants with Pockets
description: Stretchy and Soft Fabric: With comfortable four-way stretch fabric is lighter and softer than traditional womens jeans, is more flexible, and ensures all-day comfort without feeling restrictive. Durable and maintain their shape even after multiple washes

High Waist and Tummy Control: The tummy control feature provides a flattering fit that enhances your confidence. Won't slip or roll down your belly even with all the bending over on the walk. The pull-on design makes these jeggings incredibly convenient

Faux Side Pockets and Two Functional Back Pockets: Faux-front pockets create the classic jean look and ensure that the pockets don't add bulk to make a smooth and flattering fit. Two deep back pockets easily hold your phone or other essentials

Slim Fit Jeans: Skinny style and high waist design help define the waist and provide a single, clean line down to the ankle, elongating your legs for a comfortable fit. They're engineered to lift and hug your curves in all the right places

Various Occasions: Can be chosen between a short and regular inseam length, measuring 27 and 29 inches respectively. These stretchy jeans work well as everyday jeans, perfect for work, dancing, dating, weekends, and gym. Great deal for year-round wear
